item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Scale Model of Boeing 777-300ER, Made from Manila Folders (328 points | 52 comments)
2. Plasticlist Report – Data on plastic chemicals in Bay Area foods (47 points | 11 comments)
3. DivestOS ROM shuts after ten years (37 points | 25 comments)
4. Show HN: I made a web app to bring children's drawings to life (38 points | 17 comments)
5. Programming Lewis Carroll's Memoria Technica (10 points | discuss)
6. Show HN: I send myself automated emails to practice Dutch (123 points | 79 comments)
7. Show HN: NeatShift – Organize Windows files with symbolic links (6 points | 4 comments)
8. They have not been trained for this (298 points | 32 comments)
9. Complain and Propose (2014) (59 points | 24 comments)
10. Show HN: Houseplant – Database Migrations for ClickHouse (22 points | 4 comments)
11. Pseudonymity in Academic Publishing (5 points | discuss)
12. 1584 LAN party photos from 1996 – 2010 from Australia's island state archived (14 points | 3 comments)
13. Show HN: Instantly visualize any codebase as an interactive diagram (91 points | 40 comments)
14. Show HN: Kando – A cross-platform pie menu for your desktop (3 points | discuss)
15. Quiver: A Modern Commutative Diagram Editor (303 points | 35 comments)
16. Does current AI represent a dead end? (434 points | 808 comments)
17. Notice of Service Closure (147 points | 133 comments)
18. PQConnect – Automated Post-Quantum End-to-End Tunnels from DJB, Lange, ohters. (42 points | 11 comments)
19. Tangled Physics: Knots Strain Intuitive Physical Reasoning (32 points | 9 comments)
20. Archimedes, Vitruvius and Leonardo: The Odometer Connection (2020) (30 points | 1 comment)
21. The Structure of Neural Embeddings (53 points | 1 comment)
22. Missiles Are Now the Biggest Killer of Airline Passengers (480 points | 342 comments)
23. Harper (YC W25) Is Hiring Founding Engineer #2 ( | hide)
24. Ghostty 1.0 (2050 points | 596 comments)
25. Show HN: Web app that shows how good the air quality is in Chile (8 points | 4 comments)
26. S Korean crypto-boss Do Kwon to be extradited to US (65 points | 38 comments)
27. Homebrew Batteries (95 points | 9 comments)
28. Implementing SM-2 in Rust (88 points | 12 comments)
29. Fake Nintendo lawyer is scaring YouTubers, and its not clear YouTube can stop it (224 points | 148 comments)
30. NASA's Parker Solar Probe Reports Successful Closest Approach to Sun (73 points | 14 comments)
